snippet: The Giants' victory march through Lower Manhattan is set to kick off at 11 a.m. The Times's Fifth Down blog will be covering the action live.
abstract: The Giants' victory march through Lower Manhattan is set to kick off at 11 a.m. The Times's Fifth Down blog will be covering the action live.
lead_paragraph: It's an awfully nice day for a parade, especially if your team has just won the Super Bowl. For full coverage of the Giants' goal-to-goal march through Lower Manhattan's Canyon of Heroes, go to the Fifth Down blog in The Times's sports section, where Mary Pilon will be covering the action live. The parade kicks off at 11 a.m.
